
Register to
https://pypi.python.org/pypi?%3Aaction=register_form
pip install twine

#prepare package

rm -R dist

python setup.py sdist
python setup.py bdist_wheel
twine.exe check .\dist\
#upload
twine upload dist/*

#Checker la distribution
twine check .\dist\



rm -R dist

python setup.py sdist
python setup.py bdist_wheel
twine check .\dist\agmodeling-0.10-py3-none-any.whl


twine check .\dist\
